entry.title: tkbctf4 registration will begin!
entry.content:
Good morning from Japan! This is Christopher, a member of tkbctf4 team.

We are very excited to tell that we are pretty much ready to accept user/team registrations!
User/Team registrations will be accepted in less than 6 hours from now.

For more information, please visit tkbctf4’s scoreboard server.

Thank you for your patience. It’s coming up.

P.S. We have previously stated that the second day of tkbctf4 (that is Nov 3) will be held at Tsukuba University, JAPAN.
Well, guess what. It will be held as one of the attractions of our University’s campus festival!
So you can hack and slack. Cool!

entry.title: Announcing tkbctf4
entry.content:
Hello from tkbctf4 team!

Let us announce that we are going to hold tkbctf4 on the 2nd and 3rd of November.
On the first day will be an online CTF game, and on the second day the game (and some bonus games!) will be held at a CTF arena in Tsukuba, Ibaraki, JAPAN.
For those who won’t be able to visit Tsukuba on that day: Don’t worry. The online game will also be held on the 3rd.

We are anxious about your participation.

That’s all for now. Please stay tuned!
